ygData.messageBody:
Thanks for the heads up. I hadn't actually considered joining such a list,
but thanks for the warning. If anyone else had considered joining I would
strongly discourage it.

Nate

-----Original Message-----
From: EQ_Fletchers@egroups.com

Subject: [EQ_Fletchers] Digest Number 47



Message: 1
Date: Fri, 28 Jul 2000 11:11:32 -0700
From: Tim Polsfoot <polsfoot@...>
Subject: Re: Digest Number 46

You little bastard. You have been chased off of every other EQ list and
now
you show up here. Just a notice to everyone. This creep is trying to get
you to buy cheats from him. The kind of stuff that gets you banned..
